column2: CHAPTER III.
DIMPLE.
A dimple in the chin is lucky.
column3: A dimple in the chin is lucky.

column2: Some say "it shows you're no fool."
column3: Some say "it shows you're no fool."

column2: EARS.
Small ears indicate that a person is stingy.
column3: Small ears indicate that a person is stingy.

column2: EYES AND EYEBROWS.
A well-known children's rhyme runs:--
FINGER-NAILS.
A white spot in the nail, when it comes, means a present.
column3: A white spot in the nail, when it comes, means a present.

column2: Count on finger-nail spots:--
Another formula:--
An almost identical variant is found in Prince Edward Island.
column3: An almost identical variant is found in Prince Edward Island.

column2: FOOT.
FOREHEAD.
Vertical wrinkles in the brow show the number of husbands one will have.
column3: Vertical wrinkles in the brow show the number of husbands one will have.

column2: HAIR.
The color of the hair growing on the neck indicates the color of the hair of one's future husband.
column3: The color of the hair growing on the neck indicates the color of the hair of one's future husband.

column2: A single white hair means genius; it must not be pulled out.
column3: A single white hair means genius; it must not be pulled out.

column2: Put some of your hair in the fire.
column3: Put some of your hair in the fire.

column2: If it burns slowly you will have a long life.
column3: If it burns slowly you will have a long life.

column2: HAND.
In clasping your own hand, you put uppermost either your right or your left thumb.
column3: In clasping your own hand, you put uppermost either your right or your left thumb.

column2: Clasp your fingers, and if the right thumb lap over the left you were born in the daytime.
column3: Clasp your fingers, and if the right thumb lap over the left you were born in the daytime.

column2: If the left overlap, you were born at night.
column3: If the left overlap, you were born at night.

column2: If the ends of the fingers are capable of being bent far back, it indicates a thief.
column3: If the ends of the fingers are capable of being bent far back, it indicates a thief.

column2: MOLES.
A mole on the eyebrow denotes that one will be hanged.
column3: A mole on the eyebrow denotes that one will be hanged.

column2: Mole above breath Means wealth.
